testsuite.name: The Pet Clinic should allow to register a pet owner in the system

testcase.name: the one where Ricardo tries to register an already existing owner using the clinic API
the one where Kelly tries to register a new owner using the clinic API with invalid data
the one where Ricardo registers a new owner using the clinic API with all mandatory data
the one where Kelly tries to register a new owner using the Web form with invalid data
the one where Ricardo tries to register an already existing owner using the Web form
the one where Ricardo registers a new owner using the Web form with all mandatory data
